message: This is a rare opportunity to get a product at a steal! I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000, which is a 50% discount from its true value. Don't miss out on this incredible deal!
I'm not convinced by your sales pitch, Alice. I'll pass on this one.

Plus, think of it as an investment in your future - you can always resell it or use it as a learning experience. I'm still willing to sell it to you for $10000. It's a risk-free opportunity to take a chance on something new.
I'm not convinced that this product has any hidden gems, and I'm not willing to take a risk on something that's only worth $0 to me. I'll pass again.

I appreciate the offer, Alice, but I'm still not convinced that the product is worth $10000 to me, even with the bonus service package. I'll have to pass again.

The price is still $10000, but trust me, it's worth every penny. You won't find a better deal on a product like this anywhere else. Are you ready to take your work to the next level?
I appreciate your enthusiasm, Alice, but I'm still not convinced that this product is worth $10000 to me, even if it's a top-of-the-line model. I'll have to pass again.
